tool_description:
Sign up for a free account at https://clicksend.com
ClickSend is not a free service. Pricing can be found here https://clicksend.com/?r=pricing/
name: ClickSend SMS
title: ClickSend SMS

api_list.name: Send Voice TTS
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://clicksend.p.rapidapi.com/voice/send"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "clicksend.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
